stem: Which of the following features best distinguishes Crohn's disease from ulcerative colitis?
disc:
Both ulcerative colitis and Crohn's disease can affect the colon. In such cases following features can differentiate CD from UC.
- Small bowel involvement
- Sparing the rectum
- Absence of gross bleeding
- Perianal disease
- Presence of granuloma and fistulae
